name: SOS Online Backup
overview:
Established in 2001, SOS Online Backup is a pioneer of cloud storage technology. With operations in North America, Europe and Asia, SOS Online Backup delivers simple, powerful and inexpensive online data backup for more than one million consumers, small businesses and enterprises worldwide. SOS Online Backup provides continuous protection and security for customersâ€™ valuable data investments, with set apart features that include multiple redundancy and off-continental storage. SOS Online Backup has been the recipient of the PC Magazine Editorsâ€™ Choice Award since 2006 and is Laptop Magazine Editorsâ€™ Choice.

SOS Online Backup is the technology leader in the online backup industry. SOS Online Backup delivers simple, powerful and inexpensive online data backup for consumers, small businesses and enterprises worldwide. Operating a global backup network, SOS Online Backup provides continuous protection and data security with set apart features that include web access, unlimited archive storage, mobile apps and continuous data protection. SOS Online Backup has won the PC Magazine Editorsâ€™ Choice Award three consecutive times since 2006.

funding_rounds.source_description: SOS Online Backup Secures $3 Million Series A Round
